subject: U.S.A. Internal Revenue Servic
body:
U.S.A. Internal Revenue Service Department.
Bureau of Consular Affairs
Washington , DC 20520
Greeting from USA I.R.S,
Contact person: Mr. Charles P. Rettig
Attention:
I hope this message finds you well. I am writing on behalf of the
U.S.A. Internal Revenue Service Department and the Bureau of Consular
Affairs in Washington, DC.
We are pleased to inform you that your ATM Card package with reference
number 2661428, containing the sum of $1,000,000.00 USD (One Million
United States Dollars), has been released by the Homeland Security
Service under our order. However, in order to facilitate the full
release of the package and its delivery to your address via the United
States Postal Service Agent, we require your prompt cooperation.
Following a phone call made on your behalf to the USA Homeland
Security Service and the Government of the United States, it has been
determined that 
the delivery must be completed within (2) working days
upon your compliance with our directives. To proceed, kindly remit the
sum of $500.00 USD to obtain the necessary Claiming Of Ownership
Certificate from the United States.
The US Embassy has reduced the cost of the Claiming Of Ownership
Certificate, considering the challenging economic circumstances faced
by many citizens. Upon confirmation of your payment for the
certificate, we will assign the United States Postal Service Agent to
deliver your ATM Card package promptly.
Your package is guaranteed to reach you within 48 hours upon the
receipt of the $500.00 Claiming Of Ownership Certificate fee. We
assure you a 100% Money back guarantee if there is any delay beyond
this time frame.
To avoid any delivery complications, please reconfirm the following
information when contacting us:
- Your Full Name
- Delivery Address
- Contact Number
Once we receive the necessary Claiming Of Ownership Certificate and
your updated information, the USA Homeland Security Service will
release your package for delivery by the (U.S.P.S) Agent.
Please note that the payment of $500.00 USD for the Claiming Of
Ownership Certificate should be made to the United States as the
originating country of the package. 
You can choose to purchase iTunes
Gift Card or Steam Wallet Card, scratch the cards, and send us the
copies for immediate processing.
Your prompt compliance is essential to ensure the timely release of
your package. Any unclaimed consignment will be returned to the United
States Government after 5 days.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Yours Sincerely,
Mr. Charles P. Rettig
Assistant Secretary of State for United States Affairs
FROM THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA

subject: Re: U.S.A. Internal Revenue Servic
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well too. It's interesting to hear from the Internal Revenue Service Department and the Bureau of Consular Affairs in DC. I'm curious about the ATM Card package you mentioned. Can you please provide more details about it? What is the purpose of this package and how did I become eligible for it?

Also, could you clarify why there is a need for me to pay a Claiming Of Ownership fee? Is this a standard procedure? And what exactly is the fee for?

I appreciate your assistance in providing these additional details.

Best wishes,
Gerald

subject: Re: U.S.A. Internal Revenue Servic
body:
Attention Beneficiary,

 I Acknowledge the receipt of your email, I want to make it very clear to
you that all the necessary arrangement consigning the delivery of your ATM
Master Card, has been made successfully with the delivery Agent.

Following a phone call made on your behalf to the USA Homeland Security
Service and the Government of the United States, it has been determined
that the delivery must be completed within (2) working days upon your
compliance with our directives. To proceed kindly remit the sum of
$2,500.00 to obtain the necessary Claiming Of Ownership Certificate in your
name from the United States.

This process requires you to make the payment before they will issue their
receipt paper. This receipts serves as an evidence prove, thereby
satisfying luggage as genuine and legitimate having passed satisfactory
examination.

You have to make the payment of $2,500 before the delivery will take place,
And you are to pay the fee through Apple Gift Card of $500 each or Bitcoin

Thank you for your cooperation.

Yours Sincerely,
Mr. Charles P. Rettig
Assistant Secretary of State for United States Affairs
FROM THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA

subject: Re: U.S.A. Internal Revenue Servic
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the delivery of my ATM Master Card. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more details about the necessary consigning and delivery process? How long will it take for the card to be delivered once I comply with the requirements?

2. Why is there a need to involve the USA Homeland Security Service and the Government of the United States in this delivery? What role do they play in ensuring a successful delivery?

3. Could you explain further about the "Claiming Of Ownership" process? What exactly does it entail, and why is it required?

4. Is there any alternative method of payment available other than Apple Gift Cards or Bitcoin? I would like to explore different options if possible.

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Gerald
